verses.verse: And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2296>Gird<s%> up your <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6378>box<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H7433>Ramothgilead:<s%>

And when you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> out <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> in, and make him <S%H6965>arise<s%> up from <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H935>carry<s%> him to an <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>chamber;<s%>

Then <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H6378>box<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Then <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H1817>door,<s%> and <S%H5127>flee,<s%> and <S%H2442>tarry<s%> not.
So the <S%H5288>young<s%> man, even the <S%H5288>young<s%> man the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7433>Ramothgilead.<s%>

And when he <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>host<s%> were <S%H3427>sitting;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> I have an <S%H1697>errand<s%> to you, O <S%H8269>captain.<s%> And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> To <S%H4310>which<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> us? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> To you, O <S%H8269>captain.<s%>

And he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and he <S%H3332>poured<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> your <S%H113>master,<s%> that I may <S%H5358>avenge<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel.<s%>

For the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> shall <S%H6>perish:<s%> and I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H256>Ahab<s%> him that <S%H8366>urinates<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and him that is <S%H6113>shut<s%> up and left in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> and like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H281>Ahijah:<s%>

And the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> in the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> and there shall be <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> her. And he <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>door,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled.<s%>

Then <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of his <S%H113>lord:<s%> and one <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Is all <S%H7965>well?<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7696>mad<s%> fellow to you? And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, You <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H376>man,<s%> and his <S%H7879>communication.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H8267>false;<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> us <S%H4994>now.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>Thus<s%> and <S%H2063>thus<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> he to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then they <S%H4116>hurried,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H899>garment,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it <S%H8478>under<s%> him <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H1634>top<s%> of the <S%H4609>stairs,<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> with <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> is <S%H4427>king.<s%>

So <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3141>Joram.<s%> (Now <S%H3141>Joram<s%> had <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H7433>Ramothgilead,<s%> he and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria.<s%>

But <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3088>Joram<s%> was <S%H7725>returned<s%> to be <S%H7495>healed<s%> in <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> of the <S%H4347>wounds<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H761>Syrians<s%> had <S%H5221>given<s%> him, when he <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria.<s%>) And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> it be your <S%H5315>minds,<s%> then let <S%H408>none<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> nor <S%H6412>escape<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> it in <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

So <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H7392>rode<s%> in a <S%H7393>chariot,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel;<s%> for <S%H3141>Joram<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%> And <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3141>Joram.<s%>

And there <S%H5975>stood<s%> a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4026>tower<s%> in <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> and he <S%H7200>spied<s%> the <S%H8229>company<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> as he <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H8229>company.<s%> And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> an <S%H7395>horseman,<s%> and <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them, and let him <S%H559>say,<s%> Is it <S%H7965>peace?<s%>

So there <S%H3212>went<s%> one on <S%H7392>horseback<s%> <S%H5483><s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> Is it <S%H7965>peace?<s%> And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have you to do with <S%H7965>peace?<s%> <S%H5437>turn<s%> you <S%H310>behind<s%> me. And the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H5046>told,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to them, but he <S%H7725>comes<s%> not <S%H7725>again.<s%>

Then he <S%H7971>sent<s%> out a <S%H8145>second<s%> on <S%H5483>horseback,<s%> which <S%H935>came<s%> to them, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> Is it <S%H7965>peace?<s%> And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have you to do with <S%H7965>peace?<s%> <S%H5437>turn<s%> you <S%H310>behind<s%> me.

And the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H5046>told,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> He <S%H935>came<s%> even to them, and <S%H7725>comes<s%> not <S%H7725>again:<s%> and the <S%H4491>driving<s%> is like the <S%H4491>driving<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi;<s%> for he <S%H5090>drives<s%> <S%H7697>furiously.<s%>

And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Make <S%H631>ready.<s%> And his <S%H7393>chariot<s%> was made <S%H631>ready.<s%> And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out, <S%H376>each<s%> in his <S%H7393>chariot,<s%> and they <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> and <S%H4672>met<s%> him in the <S%H2513>portion<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> that he <S%H559>said,<s%> Is it <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu?<s%> And he <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> so <S%H5704>long<s%> as the <S%H2183>prostitutions<s%> of your <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> and her <S%H3785>witchcrafts<s%> are so <S%H7227>many?<s%>
And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> There is <S%H4820>treachery,<s%> O <S%H274>Ahaziah.<s%>

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> drew a <S%H7198>bow<s%> with his <S%H4390>full<s%> <S%H3027>strength,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H2220>arms,<s%> and the <S%H2678>arrow<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out at his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he <S%H3766>sunk<s%> down in his <S%H7393>chariot.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> Jehu to <S%H920>Bidkar<s%> his <S%H7991>captain,<s%> <S%H5375>Take<s%> up, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him in the <S%H2513>portion<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite:<s%> for <S%H2142>remember<s%> how that, when I and you <S%H7392>rode<s%> <S%H6776>together<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5375>laid<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4853>burden<s%> on him;

Surely I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H570>yesterday<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth,<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and I will <S%H7999>requite<s%> you in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2513>plat,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H5375>take<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into the <S%H2513>plat<s%> of ground, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But when <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> this, he <S%H5127>fled<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%> And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H7291>followed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5221>Smite<s%> him <S%H1571>also<s%> in the <S%H4818>chariot.<s%> And they did so at the <S%H4608>going<s%> up to <S%H1483>Gur,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by <S%H2991>Ibleam.<s%> And he <S%H5127>fled<s%> to <S%H4023>Megiddo,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H7392>carried<s%> him in a chariot to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his <S%H6900>sepulcher<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>
And in the <S%H6240>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3088>Joram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> began <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And when <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it; and she <S%H7760>painted<s%> <S%H6320><s%> her <S%H5869>face,<s%> and <S%H3190>tired<s%> her <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H8259>looked<s%> out <S%H1157>at<s%> a <S%H2474>window.<s%>
And as <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> in at the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> Had <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> who <S%H2026>slew<s%> his <S%H113>master?<s%>

And he <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H2474>window,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H854>on<s%> my side? <S%H4310>who?<s%> And there <S%H8259>looked<s%> out to him <S%H8147>two<s%> or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5631>eunuchs.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8058>Throw<s%> her <S%H8058>down.<s%> So they <S%H8058>threw<s%> her <S%H8058>down:<s%> and some of her <S%H1818>blood<s%> was <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H5483>horses:<s%> and he <S%H7429>stepped<s%> her under foot.

And when he was <S%H935>come<s%> in, he did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6485>Go,<s%> see <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H779>cursed<s%> woman, and <S%H6912>bury<s%> her: for she is a <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

And they <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> her: but they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3588>more<s%> <S%H518><s%> of her <S%H3588>than<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H1538>skull,<s%> and the <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of her <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

Why they <S%H7725>came<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> him. And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> by his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> In the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> shall <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel:<s%>

And the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> shall be as <S%H1828>dung<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> in the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel;<s%> so that they shall not <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is <S%H348>Jezebel.<s%>
